name: PEUGEOT 208 GT
description: The PEUGEOT 208 GT is a subcompact car that boasts a distinctive, sporty silhouette with clean and strong lines that emphasize its modern appearance. It features a range of engines, including the PureTech petrol engine, which delivers energetic drive and reduced emissions. The 208 GT also offers a range of trims and specs, including the Active, Signature, Tech Edition, and GT-Line, each with its own unique features and styling.
rate: The overall rating of the PEUGEOT 208 GT is around 8.0 out of 10

name: PEUGEOT 308 GT PREMIUM
description: The PEUGEOT 308 GT Premium is a high-performance variant of the 308 model, featuring a 1.6-liter turbocharged engine producing 205 horsepower and 221 lb-ft of torque, paired with an 8-speed automatic transmission and advanced driver assistance systems. Its sporty design is accentuated by 18-inch alloy wheels, a rear spoiler, and a distinctive GT badging. Inside, the Premium trim offers luxurious amenities, including a 10-inch touchscreen, heated and ventilated seats, and a range of advanced safety features.
rate: The overall rating of the PEUGEOT 308 GT Premium is around 8.5 out of 10

name: PEUGEOT 508 GT PREMIUM
description: The PEUGEOT 508 GT Premium is a premium sedan that boasts a sleek and innovative design, with a low-slung body, tautly drawn lines, and a muscular, steely style. It features a well-finished interior, advanced technology, and a range of efficient engines, including a plug-in hybrid option. The 508 GT Premium offers a smooth and comfortable ride, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a refined and enjoyable driving experience.
rate: The overall rating of the PEUGEOT 508 GT Premium is around 7.2 out of 10

name: PEUGEOT 2008 GT PREMIUM
description: The PEUGEOT 2008 GT Premium is a compact SUV that boasts a sleek and robust design, with a generous volume and masterful power. It features a premium interior, including a configurable 3D head-up instrument panel, full LED headlights , and a smartphone charging plate. The GT Premium trim also comes with advanced safety features, such as adaptive cruise control and keyless entry.
rate: The overall rating of the PEUGEOT 2008 GT PREMIUM to be around 7.5 out of 10

name: PEUGEOT 5008 GT
description: The PEUGEOT 5008 GT is a stylish and spacious SUV that offers a premium driving experience, featuring a sleek design, comfortable ride, and advanced technology including a 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster and an 8-inch touchscreen infotainment system. The GT trim level adds sporty touches such as 19-inch alloy wheels, a sporty front bumper, and a panoramic sunroof, while also providing a range of safety features including adaptive cruise control and lane departure warning. With a spacious interior that can seat up to seven people, the PEUGEOT 5008 GT is an ideal choice for families or those who need a versatile and feature-packed vehicle.
rate: The overall rating of the PEUGEOT 5008 GT is arround 8.0 out of 10
